snippet.title: Deepworld Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out our NEW trailer featuring tons of new content!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wMcX894oBRg

Explore an entire online universe of worlds in Deepworld, a cloud-based, massively-multiplayer 2D steampunk crafting available now for Mac (iOS and Windows coming soon!) Meet new friends and build cozy homes or massive cities. Restore the environment of a broken world and do battle with strange creatures and funky automata. The sky is the limit!

Get more info at http://deepworldgame.com and follow our twitter feed for updates: @deepworldgame

Watch our previous gameplay video for more info on the exciting social features of Deepworld! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pmLKSkdp_TA
